definition: person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse

sentences.english: Shelob's shriek is actually the sound of a Tasmanian devil.
sentences.chinese: 大蜘蛛尸罗的叫声实际上是袋獾的叫声。

sentences.english: The model of Shelob was based on a New Zealand tunnel web spider.
sentences.chinese: 尸罗的原型是新西兰隧道里的一种拉网蜘蛛。

definition: to extinguish worries and the sea of grief/nirvana (Buddhism)
Prince Ananda, cousin of the Buddha and his closest disciple
Manes (3rd century AD), Persian prophet and founder of Manichaeism
Prince Ananda, cousin of the Buddha and his closest disciple
World Honored One/Revered One of the World (Buddha)
arhat (Sanskrit)/a holy man who has left behind all earthly desires and concerns and attained nirvana (Buddhism)
monk (Sanskrit: Sramana, originally refers to north India)/Buddhist monk
another name for Sakyamuni 釋迦牟尼佛|释迦牟尼佛, the historical Buddha
Hinayana, the Lesser Vehicle/Buddhism in India before the Mayahana sutras/also pr. [Xiao3 cheng2]
